description:
MAKE IT YOURS!
Proteus Core perfectly tuned by you.
Proteus Core allows you to change the weight, balance, and enables you to adapt to wherever you choose to play. Customize it to the way you game and make it yours!

PERSONALLY-TUNED PERFORMANCE
Adapts to your environment
Fine tune the optical sensor in Proteus Core to your playing surface for better accuracy, precision and responsiveness. A quick tuning process, and you are battle ready.
